attributes.action: Stop the vote for people on Welfare handouts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ONS figures for 2003/2004 show government expenditure on social security to be £130.8 billion or over 30% of yearly expenditure. This figure is constantly increasing as a percentage and you the tax payer are footing the bill. The politicians will not reduce their handouts as free loaders are entitled to vote just as you do and the politicians will not to lose their vote. If they had no vote the government could reduce their payments and your taxes without Repurcussions. Why should someone who does not contribute get to have the vote. If they want it - then get a job!!!
